EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Marble keeps your tabs organized by automatically grouping them by domain.

MENU_AUTO_COLLAPSE.message: Collapse Groups When Not in Use

ONBOARDING_STEP_1.message: Marble will automatically organize your tabs into groups according to their domain.

ONBOARDING_STEP_2.message: Click the icon in the extension tray to refine the grouping rules or to turn off automatic grouping. Manually group your tabs anytime using the shortcut.

ONBOARDING_DONATE.message: Gifts are entirely optional but they do help me to continue creating free extensions. Thanks for your generosity!
